DESCRIPTION: Sigils are normally unplayable cards which are played when they are discarded from your hand.
Activated relics do not have a passive effect. They have an effect when their button is clicked.
Cards with an activate effect let you trigger that effect when you wish. They have a clickable button to the left of the energy orb.
Orb: Deals damage to a random enemy. Ignores #yFocus.
Creatures with Plated Armor gain #yBlock at the end of their turn. When they receive unblocked attack damage, they lose 1 Plated Armor.
Creatures with Vigor deal additional damage with their next attack.
If you play a Resonant card it is returned to your hand at the start of your next turn. If you play multiple Resonant cards in one turn, they merge into a single stronger card.
Whenever a creature with Frostbite attacks it takes damage and its Frostbite is reduced by 1.
Crushed creatures take more damage from attacks for one turn.
Whenever a Jinxed creature receives a debuff, it loses HP.
